fields.name: ErrDetEn
fields.description: If this bit is set, then correctable error detection and logging is enabled; otherwise, correctable error detection and logging is disabled.

fields.name: ErrIntEn
fields.description: If this bit is set, the Correctable Error Interrupt output signal is asserted when the number of correctable errors corrected equals the value in ErrThreshold field; otherwise, the correctable error interrupt signal is never asserted.

fields.name: ErrThreshold
fields.description: This field determines the number of correctable errors that must be corrected before the Correctable Error Interrupt output signal is asserted.

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: If this bit is set, Error information is logged in status and location registers. Writing a one to the Correctable Error Valid bit clears the Correctable Error Valid bit.

fields.name: ErrCountOverflow
fields.description: This bit indicates that the number of correctable errors detected by the unit overflowed the Correctable Error Count field

fields.name: ErrCount
fields.description: This field indicates the number of correctable errors detected by the unit. The field stops incrementing if the Correctable Error Count Overflow bit is set

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description:
This field indicates the logged error type, if the Correctable Error Valid bit is set.
0x00: Data SRAM correctable error
0x01: Cache SRAM correctable error
All other encodings are reserved

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description:
This field indicates additional information about logged error type, if the Correctable Error Valid bit is set.
If it is a Memory correctable error then
bits 1:0  2'b11 represent snoop filter (2'b00, 2'b01 and 2'b10: reserved)
bits 7:2  Reserved
bits 15:8 Represents the snoop filter number

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error valid field of xCESR

fields.name: ErrCountOverflow
fields.description: Alias bit for setting Error Count Overflow field of xCESR

fields.name: ErrCount
fields.description: Alias field for setting error Count field of xCESR

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error type field of xCESR

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error info field of xCESR

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: If this bit is set, Error information is logged in status and location registers. Writing a one to the Uncorrectable Error Valid bit clears the Correctable Error Valid bit.

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description:
This field indicates the logged error type, if the Uncorrectable Error Valid bit is set.
0x00: Data SRAM uncorrectable error
0x01: Cache SRAM uncorrectable error
0x02: Native interface write response error
0x03: Native interface read response error 
0x04: Native interface snoop response error
0x07: Decode error
0x08: Transport error 
0x09: Timeout error
All other encodings are reserved

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description: This field indicates additional information about logged error

fields.name: ErrVld
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error valid field of xUESR

fields.name: ErrType
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error type field of xUESR

fields.name: ErrInfo
fields.description: Alias bit for setting error info field of xUESR

fields.name: ResThreshold
fields.description: Threshold for the correctable error indication to the functional safety controller.

fields.name: ProtErrDetEn
fields.description: Protocol error detect enable: When set, errors will be detected from the protocol interface.

fields.name: TransErrDetEn
fields.description: Concerto Transport error detect enable: When set, errors will be detected from the Concerto Transport.

fields.name: MemErrDetEn
fields.description: Memory protection error detection enable: When set,errors will be detected from any RAM memory arrays.

fields.name: DecErrDetEn
fields.description: Decode Error Enable. When set, this bit enables detection of address map uncorrectable error

fields.name: TimeoutErrDetEn
fields.description: Timeout protection error detection enable: When set, timeout errors will be detected.

fields.name: SoftwareProgConfigErrDetEn
fields.description: Software Programming or Configuration Error Enable. When set to 1, this bit enables the detection and logging of Software Programming or Configuration Error.

fields.name: ErrAddr
fields.description: This field contains the low-order address bits of the transaction that encountered the error

fields.name: ErrAddr
fields.description: This field contains the high-order address bits of the transaction that encountered the error
